meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into eightieths for all the guests to have a slice.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to eighty in a series.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the eightieths day of the year.
meanings.sent2: He was the eightieths person to cross the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent3: The eightieths balloon in the parade got stuck in a tree, causing a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: The eightieths book on the shelf was the one she had been searching for all along.
meanings.sent5: The eightieths step of the staircase creaked loudly as she climbed up.
